title: No Action Against Men Abducting Women in Rajasthan? Video’s Old
subtitle: Fact Check of a Viral Video of Two Men Abducting Women in Rajasthan? The mother refused to let her daughter stay with him. This infuriated Shaukat & on 11 September 2017, he along with his friend went to girl’s place & forcibly took her.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, the girl’s mother refused to let her daughter go with the man since the girl had not attained a legal age of marriage at that time.

Furious with this, the girl’s husband along with his friend went to the girl’s place. When the mother tried to stopped them from taking her daughter, one of the men started beating her while the other man forcibly took the girl with them as seen on the video.

The Quint also reached out to Police Officer at the Bap tehsil police station, who confirmed that the incident is from 2017 and the two men were arrested shortly after the investigation.
